verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will praise Him!
I will praise Him!
Praise the Lamb for sinners slain
Give Him glory all ye people
For his blood has washed away each stain

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We will praise Him!
We will praise Him!
Praise the Lamb for sinners slain
Give Him glory all ye people
For his blood has washed away each stain
